markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Diving Suit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1261)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 19</row>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn clothing

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Diving suits are bulky, waterproofed leather outfits with copper helmets, worn by divers and underwater salvagers. The suit grants a +1 item bonus to [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39) checks made underwater, and the helmet features tubes for connecting [_bottled air_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=250). When connected to a diving suit, bottled air doesn't need to be held and can be used to breathe as a free action. If you wear armor over a diving suit, you become [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) until you remove the diving suit.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Diving Suit
